topic.title: Links
topic.body: How do I add links in my blog sidebar? Thanks

topic.title: Telegram
topic.body: I keep hearing that Telegram is less secure than whatsapp imessage and some others.  but I still prefer Telegram.  I mean whatsapp with it's almost a billion users is more of a metadata treasure trove than Telegram.  I feel like sometimes is not what you saying but who you are connecting with on the wire. So even if Whatsapp has stronger encryption does it matter to the security agencies and facebook? They know who you are connecting with.  you get flagged by association I think. So Telegram hosted overseas is a better option I think.

5039_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: the critics didn't see that coming

1_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body:
> [erkan](#comment_146_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): move the mouse around the area, then you will see a pencil symbol with which you can edit the area

oh nice. thanks a lot :)

4_1Ci5Y4TxZwY1SQhvQR7Ttbdyyai4WRV5TU.body: I have used both. I kinda liked gentoo more. It seemed more mysterious to me but the compiling was crazy man.

5_1HDGK4rrMzuouF8hNnxfMNpWyR8qAtP4HR.body: steemit in interesting. I saw zeronet been talked about on there which is a good thing.

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body:
> [haskell](#comment_11_1KA9sLxVY9KBmdEV73UqXXQhDe4ZS8k3LY): use Signal

yea I tried it but the problem is getting friends and family to use it too :)

> [shitpost007](#comment_6_18xnnGt34EMR7CLFoAjwzhYCmXGtZYC17P): use ring.cx

first time hearing of it

> [astzor](#comment_2_1LfQ8dwqkqkGQNCg1kBevHPxjvTRJTQYBz): Telegram uses its own cryptography. 
> The #1 rule of cryptography is to never role out your own crypto.
> This is why Signal beats Telegram. It use standard encryption.Whatsapp uses Signal's protocol for making communication better than Telegram.
> Thus Whatsapp beats Telegram.

I understand that

6899_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: they doing a brisk trade with people's data.
